item.title: Running multiple wallets
item.description: Multiwallet setup Particl Desktop Particl Core Autostart multiwallet Particl Desktop Particl Core Linux You might want to create and use multiple wallets for different usage. The goal is to separate your finances, so they won’t mix up. This approach will also help you gain a bit more privacy (never linking all of your available funds).
